module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.15* Update license file *2.11.0.14* Using insert_id function from wrapper *2.11.0.13* Changed the specified lines in the files mentioned to add gettext formatting *2.11.0.12* Fixed #6871, Basically dont use Asterisk's built in come back to origin, do it ourselves. Also Fixed #6774, act like the rest of FreePBX *2.11.0.11* Fix typo *2.11.0.10* Add hint for the Parking Lot as a whole *2.11.0.9* Set default destination to terminate call, hangup *2.11.0.8* Add min range to number boxes *2.11.0.7* #6375 proper fix *2.11.0.6* Worked on #6378 Parking Destination and Alternate destination problems, still not perfect. Fixes #6343 *2.11.0.5* Fixes #6375 park retrieve issue and needsreload *2.11.0.4* #6374 sql error updating *2.11.0.3* fix some localization *2.11.0.2* Cleanup of wording *2.11.0.1* Completely rewritten from the ground up. Fixes #5498, #5549 *2.10.0.2* #5901 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.4* #4965, #4972 *2.9.0.3* #4914 *2.9.0.2* #4224 *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* #4655
